meta.title: From SHOT to ROCK
meta.author: Sandy Weisz
meta.message: In curling, the shot rock is the stone closest to the tee, i.e. the button, i.e. the center of the house, i.e. the middle of the circle. It's the stone currently winning the point. You're "sitting shot" or "lying shot" if the shot rock is yours.
